t:test_case.t:objective: \\ should be retained and should not be escaped
* should be retained and should not be escaped
? should be retained and should not be escaped
**** should be retained after adding \ for each *
???? should be retained after adding \ for each ?
Combination of multiple \*? characters. They should be quoted correctly -- sieve\****????\\\test --> sieve\*\*\*\*\?\?\?\?\\test
The subject should be retained as is even if :quotewildcard is used and no characters are present in subject
Case for delete and replaceheader matching * and ?
\\ should be retained and should not be escaped
matches with * should be treated as a character
matches with ? should be treated as a character
matches with * should be treated as a character. So anything specified in subject like # should return false
matches with ? should be treated as a character. So anything specified in subject like * should return false
